title: Will we ever be able to get these icons
body:
* I was just looking thru league of legends wiki when i saw two icons i've never seen before http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d7/ProfileIcon977.png/revision/latest?cb=20151113221736            http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/1e/ProfileIcon978.png/revision/latest?cb=20151113221815
will we ever get them cause they look really cool {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
I believe they fall under the "Legacy" profile pictures, only obtainable through hextech crafting.
like my profile picture. i got it via hextech.
They look like good banter, but nah, probably not.
